label: phishing
title: Netflix Account Suspension
explanation: This is a phishing site. Notice the suspicious domain (media.netflix.com), fake suspension notice, and urgency to enter payment details.

label: real
title: Apple Store India
explanation: This is the legitimate Apple Store India website. Notice the correct domain (apple.com/in), clean Apple design with black navigation, proper product categories, and official Apple branding throughout.

label: phishing
title: Tiffany & Co. Store
explanation: This is a phishing site. Notice the suspicious '80% OFF' banner which is unrealistic for a luxury brand like Tiffany & Co., and the overall design inconsistencies that don't match the legitimate brand.
indicators: tiffany.app.yy is a fake domain name
Too good to be true offers

label: real
title: Google Search
explanation: This is the legitimate Google search page. Notice the correct domain (google.com), proper SSL certificate, and familiar Google branding.

label: phishing
title: PayPal Login
explanation: This is a phishing site. Notice the suspicious domain (pay-pail.com) which is a misspelling of paypal.com, red error indicators on the login form, and pressure tactics to create urgency.

label: real
title: Facebook Login Page
explanation: This is the legitimate Facebook login page. Notice the correct domain (facebook.com), familiar blue Facebook branding, standard login form with email/phone and password fields, and proper security features.

label: phishing
title: Microsoft Office 365 Portal
explanation: This is a phishing site. Notice the suspicious background image and layout that doesn't match Microsoft's standard Office 365 login page, along with potential domain inconsistencies.

label: real
title: Amazon India Homepage
explanation: This is the legitimate Amazon India website. Notice the correct domain (amazon.in), familiar Amazon orange branding, proper navigation with search bar, product categories, and professional e-commerce layout.

label: phishing
title: Twitter Home
explanation: This is not the legitimate Twitter website. Notice the domain (x.home.app), familiar Twitter branding, and proper design but not the exact domain name.

label: phishing
title: Google Account Verification
explanation: This is a phishing site. Notice the suspicious domain (google-verify.net), fake verification request, and threat language.
